original_title: Ante el cadáver de un líder
overview: A union leader dies in a sleazy hotel room, then the wife, mistress, police, co workers, reporters, colleagues, and political figures arrive to the hotel and each has its own intentions.

production_companies.name: Sindicato de Trabajadores de la Producción Cinematográfica (STPC)

tagline: Before the corpse of a leader the enemies are discovered and the "friends" fight for power...
title: Before the Corpse of a Leader
